original_text: And the congregation shall rescue the manslayer from the hand of the avenger of blood, and the congregation shall restore him to his city of refuge to which he had fled, and he shall live in it until the death of the high priest who was anointed with the holy oil.
korean_text: 피를 보복하는 자의 손에서 살인자를 건져내어 그가 피하였던 도피성으로 돌려보낼 것이요 그는 거룩한 기름 부음을 받은 대제사장이 죽기까지 거기 거주할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: And the congregation shall rescue the manslayer
from the hand of the avenger of blood
and the congregation shall restore him
and he shall live in it
until the death of the high priest
who was anointed with the holy oil
